title: Text Analyzer - International Hackathon
description: Allows user to detect the texts which selected from the given group of text

title: Socail Media Analytical Dashboard
description: A web application that enables users to compare their own social Media platform.

title: Gas Leak Detector
description: A real-time gas leakage detection system using an MQ2 sensor and ESP32 that triggers alerts via Ntfy to prevent fire hazards and accidents.

title: Temprature Logger
description: A smart food tracking device that monitors and logs food temperature, freshness, and storage conditions while sending alerts through Ntfy.
